titleInfo.title: Tom T. Hall, Bill Anderson, Minnie Pearl, and More at Zembo Mosque (18601)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (red and black on green) announcing Tom T. Hall, Bill Anderson, Minnie Pearl, Red Sovine, Grandpa Jones, Little Jimmy Dickens, Mary Lou Turner, Spirits of Bluegrass, and more at Zembo Mosque on April 15. Poster features metal photoplates of Tom T. Hall, Bill Anderson, Minnie Pearl, Red Sovine, Grandpa Jones, and Little Jimmy Dickens. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
